name: 生活Live风格标题模板
description: 轻松活泼的生活化风格，采用浅蓝色气泡、云朵、铅笔等装饰元素，适合生活类内容
author: md-ai

h1.name: 一级标题 - 气泡对话框+云朵装饰
h1.description: 浅蓝色圆角气泡，左侧云朵装饰，右侧铅笔装饰，轻松活泼的生活化风格
h1.template: {{text}}

h2.name: 二级标题 - 圆角气泡+波浪线
h2.description: 浅蓝色圆角气泡，底部有波浪线装饰，简洁优雅
h2.template: {{text}}

h3.name: 三级标题 - 左侧圆点+气泡
h3.description: 左侧彩色圆点装饰，右侧浅蓝色气泡，活泼可爱
h3.template: {{text}}

h4.name: 四级标题 - 下划线+圆点
h4.description: 左侧小圆点，右侧文字带下划线装饰，简洁清新
h4.template:
<section style="display: inline-flex; align-items: center; margin: 18px 0; gap: 12px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="4">
  <section style="width: 10px; height: 10px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, {{blue1}}, {{blue2}}); border-radius: 50%; flex-shrink: 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(66, 165, 245, 0.3);">
    <section style="width: 4px; height: 4px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6); border-radius: 50%; margin: 3px;"></section>
  </section>
  <section style="color: {{textBlue}}; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.4px; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 3px solid {{lightBlue3}}; box-shadow: 0 2px 0 {{pink2}};">
    {{text}}
  </section>
</section>

h5.name: 五级标题 - 圆角标签
h5.description: 浅蓝色圆角标签样式，小巧精致
h5.template:
<section style="display: inline-block; background: linear-gradient(135deg, {{bubbleBlue}}, {{lightBlue2}}); border-radius: 22px; padding: 8px 18px; margin: 16px 0; box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(66, 165, 245, 0.2), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); border: 1.5px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="5">
  <section style="color: {{textBlue}}; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; text-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);">
    {{text}}
  </section>
</section>

h6.name: 六级标题 - 简约圆点
h6.description: 左侧小圆点，右侧文字，最简洁的设计
h6.template:
<section style="display: inline-flex; align-items: center; margin: 14px 0; gap: 10px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="6">
  <section style="width: 8px; height: 8px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, {{blue1}}, {{blue2}}); border-radius: 50%; flex-shrink: 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(66, 165, 245, 0.3);">
    <section style="width: 3px; height: 3px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); border-radius: 50%; margin: 2.5px;"></section>
  </section>
  <section style="color: {{textBlue}}; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.2px; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;">
    {{text}}
  </section>
</section>

usage.description: 这是一个生活化风格的标题样式模板，采用浅蓝色气泡、云朵、铅笔等装饰元素，适合生活类、轻松活泼的内容

variables.{{iconUrl}}: 图标URL，使用模板中的iconUrl字段
variables.{{bgImageUrl}}: 背景图片URL，使用模板中的bgImageUrl字段

usage.applyMethod: 在渲染器中替换heading函数，使用对应的模板生成HTML
